content: Amazon's deals of the day on Aug. 27 include the Sonos Arc, Apple AirPods Max, Amazon Kindle, Garmin Forerunner 265S, and Amazon Smart Thermostat.
summary: Amazon's deals of the day on Aug. 27 include the Sonos Arc, Apple AirPods Max, Amazon Kindle, Garmin Forerunner 265S, and Amazon Smart Thermostat.
